event.title: was created by an act of the Georgia General Assembly on February 8, 1854

data.event: Dallas was created by an act of the Georgia General Assembly on February 8, 1854, on 40 acres (160,000 m2) purchased from Garrett H. Spinks on May 14, 1852, for $1000.

event.title: purchased from Garrett H. Spinks on May 14, 1852

data.event: Dallas was created by an act of the Georgia General Assembly on February 8, 1854, on 40 acres (160,000 m2) purchased from Garrett H. Spinks on May 14, 1852, for $1000.
In the late 1850s the town no longer elected officers and a new charter was issued in 1883.
